resources.string: This app is the result of the development under two projects focusing on Android and Bluetooth. The first one during Spring and Summer 2014, and the second during Winter 2015.

This app is divided in two main sections: first, the test management part, and secondly, the status monitorization part. 
The first part focuses on setting the test parameters and when to start a test. 
The second one shows live information of the current status for the ongoing test. 
There are many aspects being monitored during a test, and even as soon as you run this app, some information is already being monitored and logged into the device's file system. 
In the log files you can find information about the CPU usage, the Battery state, and all the Bluetooth related test-data per communication channel (ping times, message sizes, etc.)
